body.name: HOROW HR-ST076W Elongated Toilet with Left-Hand Trip Lever, One Piece Toilet for Bathroom, Soft Closing Seat Include, Single Side Flush High Efficiency 1.28 GPF, 12'' Rough-In, White Toilet Bowl
features: Modern Luxury Design: Our elongated toilet is a more classic style, with smooth shape and one-piece molding. Luxurious modern design single flush toilet with a left-hand trip lever, clean, sleek look, and compliment with different styles like a modern, craftsman, traditional and etc.

Easy To Clean: The HR-ST076W's fully skirted trapway design makes it extremely easy to clean. It can be kept clean for a longer time because of using self-cleaning materials. Compare to other standard toilets, it has no corners and grooves and is very easy to reach for cleaning, not like others hard to reach.

Easy to Install: Two big installation access on the side and a left-hand trip lever allows the plumber to install this side flush toilet much easier. Package includes toilet, soft closing toilet seat, pre-installed flush valve, high-quality wax ring, floor bolts, and also installation instructions.

Space Saver Toilet: This toilet measures just 28.75 inches deep by 14 inches wide and 28 inches high, ensuring plenty of room for comfort in a small space. Great for apartments, small bathrooms, ensuite bathrooms, and more.

Water Saving Performance: This water saving toilet labeled Watersense meets strict EPA flushing guidelines, a highly efficient toilet that allows you to proactively conserve water by using a 1.28GPF side flush. It uses 20 degree less water and performs as well as or better than regular toilets.

High-Quality Toilet Seat: This white finish toilet comes with soft closing seating that makes sitting down and standing up easier for most adults, also no worry about slamming and the bumpers prevent the seat from shifting during use. And the PP seat with a stainless steel durable hinge, easy to get the toilet seat off to tighten or clean after years of use.

Quite and Powerful Flushing: Siphon Flushing one piece toilets that uses a patented flushing engine, bringing super quiet and powerful flushing. Great Maximum Performance Flush score of 800 grams, it can flush 4X more than the average adult needs. Fully glazed 2" trapway - NO clogs, No flapper, No leaks.

Warranty: HOROW toilets are warranted to be free of defects for one year from the date. We value each customer’s shopping experience, therefore our toilets come with lifetime after-sales service and 1-year limited warranty. Our customer service center will respond to messages within 12 hours.
Certifications: cUPC,UPC and Water Sense certified. CEC compliant. cUPC certified water flush valve.

Note: This bathroom toilet is designed for floor mounting, 12” Rough-in. It fits both 7/8'' water line and 1/2'' water line. If your supply line size is 7/8", you could directly connect your water line to the toilet. If your supply line size is 1/2", please screw off the adapter, then connect it.
body.description: Elongated Toilet with Left-Handed Trip Lever Features One-piece design. Fully skirted trapway, extremely easy to clean.An elongated toilet bowl offers added room and comfort.Single side flush 1.28 GPF, saves more water than other toilets. Certified by WaterSense Single-flush gravity uses the force of gravity and a precision-engineered tank, bowl, and trapway to create a strong siphon during flushing The MAP score value is as high as 800 Standard 12-inch rough-in Two big opening holes on the side to quick-connect installation Soft close seat included, and supply line sold separately

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: White Side Flush Elongated One Piece Toilet With Soft Close Seat Water Closet The toilet has a sleek and eye-appealing modern design, Although designed for very small spaces, this one-piece toilet looks perfect in every modern bathroom. Unique shape, low-key luxury, and connotation, to satisfy all your illusions about the bathroom. HOROW is committed to "bringing beauty home".

Packing List Elongated Toilet *1 Quick Release Elongated Toilet Seat *1 Tank lid *1 Pre-installed Flush Valve *1 High-quality Wax Ring *1 Flush fittings button *1 Floor Bolts 1 Set Installation Instruction Elongated Toilet with Left-Handed Trip Lever Features One-piece design. Fully skirted trapway, extremely easy to clean.An elongated toilet bowl offers added room and comfort.Single side flush 1.28 GPF, saves more water than other toilets. Certified by WaterSense Single-flush gravity uses the force of gravity and a precision-engineered tank, bowl, and trapway to create a strong siphon during flushing The MAP score value is as high as 800 Standard 12-inch rough-in Two big opening holes on the side to quick-connect installation Soft close seat included, and supply line sold separately

Easy to Clean Surface Smooth-sided, the ceramic glazed surface is easier to keep clean. Concealed trapway enhances the look and makes cleaning easier by eliminating the hard-to-reach curves and crevices where dirt hides. Even after years of use. That means you spend less time cleaning and more time enjoying Simple Side-press Knob Toilet Never sacrificing in functionality or aesthetics, the toilet delivers a 1.28 GPF flush. At 1.28 gallons per flush, this high-efficiency toilet conserves up to 16,500 gallons of water per year compared to a 3.5-gallon toilet Quick Release Design Designed for this toilet, our easy-release seat features three steps of operating- click, remove, install, just where you need it, for drive away dirty, no matter when you want to change it

Two Sizes of Supply Line Inlet Hose Our toilet fits both 7/8'' water line and 1/2'' water line. If your supply line size is 7/8", you could directly connect your water line to the toilet. If your supply line size is 1/2", please remove the adapter, then connect it. Super Quiet & Powerful Flushing Fully glazed flush,bringing a super-quiet and powerful flush-No clogs, No leaks. Leak-proof. Highly efficient single full flush 1.28GPF Soft Closing Seat High-end soft closing toilet seat with stainless steel durable seat hinge.It closes quietly and slowly. Soft-close seat-in is nice in the middle of the night, with no accidental clanging to wake the house

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love new 3 new toilets!
reviews.reviewText: All of my new toilets are amazing! They flush well, are very quiet, don't take forever to re-fill, and they look beautiful. I ordered three of these, and the plumber told me at first he was worried they would be difficult to install, but then told me they were easy, they had large enough openings to install easily with plenty of room, and did I mention how beautiful they are? I love the soft close lids as well. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks great and works nice so far, although…
reviews.reviewText: Came well-packaged with a wax ring and installation was fairly simple yet challenging due to the modern design which doesn’t allow for much room to work.My problem since having it was the toilet seat hinge got loose and upon screwing it broke - and Horow doesn’t seem to sell extra hinges and the universal hinges on Amazon do not work…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, slow-closing toilet
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Got this toilet right in time! The toilet that came with the house was starting to leak and show signs of damage around the seat. Order this toilet and it arrived very quickly all I would peace, no pun intended. Contrary the standard toilets, the setup is very simple and can be done with one person but would benefit another to hand off tools and supplies while fixing the toilet over the flange. This tank connects to the seat and reduces grinding of the two parts against each other over time. It also prevents build up of bacteria underneath where the two sections meet. You can see in the video how slowly this closes, a great Advantage for those who live with residents who have a tendency to let the toilet seat slam down. No longer have to worry about the sudden slamming of the porcelain on the seat!The only thing I would be wary of is checking the instructions and making sure that this will fit your previous flange and pipe fittings in the ground. This has a slightly irregular size cup area that connects to the fittings on on the floor, at least compared to the previous toilet. There are Universal adapters you can buy in case of such a problem, or just be sure to install this toilet in a newly built bathroom to avoid any sort of extra purchases. No issues with flushing or the tank itself, and it works incredibly well four different varied amounts of waste being flushed down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Installation was easy except angle to get in holes to tighten the bolts. It sits close to wall. It is nice looking and flushes well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Update: After having this toilet for a couple months it’s the worst purchase I have ever made. It gets stopped up daily with basic tissue. I absolutely do not recommend anyone waste their money on this junk toilet.If you’re looking for an outstanding one piece, easy to clean, powerful toilet, this is the one! When I purchase this toilet, there were no reviews and I had never heard of this brand. After receiving, and installing the toilet, I must say I am more than impressed. The durability and sleek design of the toilet is exactly what I was looking for. Totally worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for a smaller space.
reviews.reviewText: I like the one-piece design and the flush mechanism.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This toilet looks so nice and sleek in our space. Can’t wait to move into our house so we can use it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When I got this toilet and reached out to the service department of Horow they promptly contacted me and addressed all of my questions and concerns. The service department is outstanding and they are willing to work with you. This product fits well in my small bathroom. I would recommend this product and company to everyone and would not hesitate to buy again. Thank you Horow.
